name: Tennis For Two - except it is a very bad Smash Bros. Boss Battle
name_original: Tennis For Two - except it is a very bad Smash Bros. Boss Battle
description:
SLIGHT VOLUME WARNING IT MAY BE LOUD!

Controls:

Crazy Hand (left player) - W & S Keys

Master Hand (right player) - Up Arrow & Down Arrow Key

If Luigi Gets stuck between the ceiling and the wall, you can wait for him to calm down or start over by refreshing the page.

Thank you for playing!!!
